options.text: Modern populism is a direct result of liberal democracy

options.label: B
options.text: Modern populism emerged as a response to issues in liberal democracies

options.label: C
options.text: Liberal democracy and modern populism are unrelated ideologies

options.label: D
options.text: Modern populism is a rejection of all forms of democracy

options.label: B

options.label: C

options.label: D
